content: lisa s olympic scarves skill-level easy scarf i + iii intermediate scarf ii finished measurements scarf i 7 wide 60 long scarf ii 4 5 wide 80 long harley s scarf iii 1 75 wide 20 long without fringes fringes 5 long materials for all 3 scarves together 14oz/396g 728yd/666m worsted weight yarn used in patterns red heart super saver 100% acrylic - color #885 delft blue a and #311 white b each 1 skein 7oz/198g 364yd/333m - size us-10 5 6 5mm crochet hook - yarn needle gauge 12 double_crochet and 8 double_crochet row =4 /10cm abbreviations used beg beginning bptr back post treble_crochet yo twice draw up a loop from back to front to back under post of st in the row below yo and draw through 2 loops on hook 3 times always skip the st directly behind the bptr chain chain double_crochet double_crochet fptr front post treble_crochet yo twice draw up a loop from front to back to front under post of st in the row below yo and draw through 2 loops on hook 3 times always skip the st directly behind the fptr single_crochet single_crochet skip skip st s stitch es treble_crochet treble_crochet * repeat whatever follows the * as indicated special stitch shell 4 double_crochet chain 1 4 double_crochet all worked in indicated stitch instructions scarf i with color a chain 30 row 1 rs 1 treble_crochet in 5th chain from hook *skip 3 chain work shell =4 double_crochet chain 1 4 double_crochet in next chain skip 3 chain 1 treble_crochet in next chain repeat from * 2 more times 1 treble_crochet in last chain row 2 chain 4 1 treble_crochet in next treble_crochet *skip next 4 double_crochet work shell around next chain-1 loop skip next 4 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet in next treble_crochet repeat from * 2 more times 1 treble_crochet on top of beg chain-4 row 3-5 repeat row 2 row 6-7 change to color b and repeat row 2 repeat row 2-7 for 10 more times than work last 5 row in color b fasten_off scarf ii worked sideways with color b chain 244 sts row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across row 243 sts row 2 rs chain 3 double_crochet in each st across row 243 sts including beg chain-3 row 3 rs change to color a with rs facing join yarn in beg of row chain 3 1fptr in next double_crochet *double_crochet in each of next 5 sts 1 fptr around next double_crochet repeat from * across row to last st double_crochet on top of beg chain-3 row 4 change to color b chain 3 double_crochet in next of 4 sts 1 bptr around next double_crochet *double_crochet in each of next 5 sts 1 bptr around next double_crochet repeat from * across row to last 4 sts double_crochet in last 4 sts row 5 chain 3 double_crochet in next of 4 sts 1 fptr around next bptr *double_crochet in each of next 5
